name: MongoDB Enterprise V-81883
title: MongoDB must protect the confidentiality and integrity of all information at rest.
script:
enableEncryption="enableEncryption"
checkfile="/etc/mongod.conf"
if [ -f $checkfile ]
then
    log=$(grep -i "${enableEncryption}" "${checkfile}" | grep -Ev "#" | grep -i "true")

    if [ -z "$log" ]
    then
       echo "$enableEncryption cannot be found or it is not set to true within $checkfile"

       exit 1
    else
       echo "$enableEncryption:"true" exist within $checkfile"
       exit 0
    fi
    else
       echo "$checkfile does not exist"
       exit 1
    fi
